item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, March 26, 2025 at 6:25 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Debian bookworm live images now reproducible (94 points | 23 comments)
2. A love letter to the CSV format (89 points | 71 comments)
3. Good-bye core types; Hello Go as we know and love it (41 points | discuss)
4. Google’s two-year frenzy to catch up with OpenAI (30 points | 29 comments)
5. Sharding Pgvector (18 points | discuss)
6. Coordinating the Superbowl's visual fidelity with Elixir (552 points | 131 comments)
7. Firefox Is Finally (Re)Adding Support for Web Apps (50 points | 34 comments)
8. Kilo Code: Speedrunning open source coding AI (16 points | 15 comments)
9. Weave (YC W25) is hiring a founding product engineer ( | hide)
10. MCP server for Ghidra (23 points | 8 comments)
11. Heap-overflowing Llama.cpp to RCE (181 points | 39 comments)
12. Linux kernel 6.14 is a big leap forward in performance and Windows compatibility (85 points | 50 comments)
13. Fragment of a human face aged over one million years discovered (46 points | 27 comments)
14. Microsoft Study: AI Makes Human Cognition "Atrophied and Unprepared" (45 points | 19 comments)
15. Gemma3 Function Calling (11 points | 2 comments)
16. An Interview with Zen Chief Architect Mike Clark (64 points | 2 comments)
17. 'Naive' science fan faces jail for plutonium import (44 points | 12 comments)
18. Supreme Court takes up $8B phone and internet subsidy for rural areas (16 points | 7 comments)
19. Pi Pico Rx – A crystal radio for the digital age? (104 points | 11 comments)
20. High-Performance PNG Decoding (43 points | 2 comments)
21. Hyperlight WASM: Fast, secure, and OS-free (150 points | 53 comments)
22. A glitch in an online survey replaced the word 'yes' with 'forks' (52 points | 8 comments)
23. Fast columnar JSON decoding with arrow-rs (31 points | 6 comments)
24. Has the decline of knowledge work begun? (31 points | 9 comments)
25. Servo vs. Ladybird (18 points | 6 comments)
26. Trapping misbehaving bots in an AI Labyrinth (174 points | 131 comments)
27. Unofficial Windows 7 Service Pack 2 (171 points | 35 comments)
28. A (Long) Peek into Reinforcement Learning (132 points | 14 comments)
29. StarVector: Generating Scalable Vector Graphics Code from Images and Text (50 points | 4 comments)
30. Collapse OS (76 points | 31 comments)
